title: Tom Holland | Ron Johnson Says Mouthwash Kills COVID; Fox News Lies About Omicron: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republicans falsely claiming that Democrats want to return to lockdowns and suggesting that you can use mouthwash to treat COVID as cases are once again surging and a new variant spreads.

Then, Tom Holland talks about press screenings only showing 40 minutes of Spider-Man: No Way Home, being behind on Christmas shopping and the difficulty of getting in and out of his suit.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
